channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【February 2026 Insiders (version 1.110)】2026 年 2 月 Insider（版本 1.110）
item.description: 【Learn what is new in the Visual Studio Code February 2026 Release (1.110). Read the full article】了解 Visual Studio Code 2026 年 2 月版本 (1.110) 中的新增功能。阅读全文

item.title: 【Microsoft C++ (MSVC) Build Tools v14.51 Preview Released: How to Opt In】Microsoft C++ (MSVC) 构建工具 v14.51 预览版已发布：如何选择加入
item.description: 【Today we are releasing the first preview of the Microsoft C++ (MSVC) Build Tools version 14.51. This update, shipping in the latest Visual Studio 2026 version 18.4 Insiders release, introduces many C++23 conformance changes, bug fixes, and runtime performance improvements. Check out the】今天，我们发布了 Microsoft C++ (MSVC) 构建工具版本 14.51 的第一个预览版。此更新在最新的 Visual Studio 2026 版本 18.4 Insiders 版本中发布，引入了许多 C++23 一致性更改、错误修复和运行时性能改进。查看

item.title: 【What's new in Microsoft Foundry | Dec 2025 & Jan 2026】Microsoft Foundry 的新增功能 | 2025 年 12 月 & 2026 年 1 月
item.description: 【Author's note: So.. it has been a bit. I have to level with you — I returned from paternity leave in January and between Microsoft Ignite 2025 and present day, things have changed a lot. Without further adieu, here is your monthly (late) drop for all things new with Microsoft Foundry. Expect following ed】作者注：所以..已经有点了。我必须坦白地告诉你——我在一月份休完陪产假回来，从 Microsoft Ignite 2025 到今天，事情发生了很大变化。言归正传，以下是每月（较晚）发布的 Microsoft Foundry 的所有新内容。期待以下编辑

item.title: 【Python Environments Extension for VS Code】VS Code 的 Python 环境扩展
item.description: 【Introducing the Python Environments Extension for VS Code Python development in VS Code now has a unified, streamlined workflow for managing environments, interpreters, and packages. The Python Environments extension brings consistency and clarity to a part of Python development that has historically been fragmented】引入 VS Code 的 Python 环境扩展 VS Code 中的 Python 开发现在拥有统一、简化的工作流程，用于管理环境、解释器和包。 Python 环境扩展为历史上支离破碎的 Python 开发部分带来了一致性和清晰度

item.title: 【Federating Databases with Data API Builder Chaining】使用 Data API Builder 链接联合数据库
item.description: 【For decades, DBAs relied on linked servers to stitch data together. If you needed data from two places, you wired them up and moved on. It worked. It was straightforward. It felt native to SQL. But what if linked servers are not an option? What if policy blocks them? What if one of the systems is not SQL or lives in another cloud? H】几十年来，DBA 依靠链接服务器将数据拼接在一起。如果您需要来自两个地方的数据，您可以将它们连接起来并继续。它起作用了。这很简单。它感觉是 SQL 原生的。但是如果链接服务器不可行怎么办？如果政策阻止他们怎么办？如果其中一个系统不是 SQL 或者位于另一个云中怎么办？ H

item.title: 【TFVC Remove Existing Obsolete Policies ASAP】TFVC 尽快删除现有的过时政策
item.description: 【In April 2025, we announced the deprecation schedule for legacy TFVC check-in policies. This change was required due to limitations in how those policies were previously implemented and stored. The old policies have been marked as obsolete, and you can replac】2025 年 4 月，我们宣布了旧版 TFVC 签入政策的弃用时间表。由于之前实施和存储这些策略的方式存在限制，因此需要进行此更改。旧策略已被标记为过时，您可以更换

item.title: 【Could Write­Process­Memory be made faster by avoiding the intermediate buffer?】通过避免中间缓冲区可以使 WriteProcessMemory 更快吗？
item.description: 【A little while ago, we wondered whether Write­Process­Memory was faster than shared memory for transferring data between two processes, and th】不久前，我们想知道在两个进程之间传输数据时，WriteProcessMemory 是否比共享内存更快，并且

item.title: 【PowerShell, OpenSSH, and DSC team investments for 2026】2026 年 PowerShell、OpenSSH 和 DSC 团队投资
item.description: 【Team investments for 2026 As is tradition, we are publishing our planned team investments for the year. This is based on our current understanding of customer and community needs, but is subject to change based on emerging priorities throughout the year. Community thanks! Before we dive into the planned investments, I wa】2026 年团队投资 按照惯例，我们将公布今年的团队投资计划。这是基于我们目前对客户和社区需求的理解，但可能会根据全年出现的优先事项而发生变化。社区感谢！在我们深入研究计划投资之前，我

item.title: 【JMESPath support comes to azd JSON output】azd JSON 输出支持 JMESPath
item.description: 【JMESPath support comes to azd JSON output Now you can filter and transform azd JSON output using JMESPath queries What's new? The Azure Developer CLI (azd) now supports JMESPath queries on JSON output, including error messages. Pass --query】azd JSON 输出支持 JMESPath 现在您可以使用 JMESPath 查询过滤和转换 azd JSON 输出 有什么新功能？ Azure 开发人员 CLI (azd) 现在支持对 JSON 输出（包括错误消息）进行 JMESPath 查询。通过--查询

item.title: 【Dear Copilot, can you help me with SQL?】亲爱的 Copilot，你能帮我解决 SQL 问题吗？
item.description: 【Perhaps we missed it at first, but Copilot is more than comfortable with SQL. This goes beyond autocomplete. This is moving from nothing to a working database without leaving our tools. Have we really arrived? Yes, sort of. For database engineers and app engineers alike, we have crossed an important line. Making us more productive i】也许我们一开始就忽略了这一点，但 Copilot 对 SQL 非常熟悉。这超出了自动完成的范围。这就是在不离开我们的工具的情况下从无到有的数据库转变为可工作的数据库。我们真的到了吗？是的，有点像。对于数据库工程师和应用程序工程师来说，我们已经跨越了一条重要的界限。让我们更有生产力
